text: A triacontagon or 30-gon is a shape with 30 sides and 30 corners. == Regular triacontagon == All sides of a regular triacontagon are the same length. Each corner is 168°. All corners added together equal 5040°. === Area === The amount of space a regular triacontagon takes up is :\text{Area} = \frac{15}{4} a^2 (\sqrt{15} + 3\sqrt{3} + \sqrt{2}\sqrt{25+11\sqrt{5}}) a is the length of one of its sides. 30
title: Triacontagon
